caption.p: (a-b) Graphs showing the effect of different concentrations of extracts on the amount of biofilm formed (optical density-OD) by S. aureus. MBS, Bridelia stenocarpa; MAS , Anogeissus sericea; MTL, Trichilia lanata; MGV, Grossera vignei; MAA, Acacia ataxacantha; MAF, Albizia ferruginea; MHF, Holarrhena floribunda; MTS, Triplochiton scleroxylon; CIP, ciprofloxacin.
